Paytable.paybackBody: For this game, the long-term, theoretically-expected payback is {RTP}.

Error.genericErrorText: There has been an internal error. EXIT and relaunch the game. 0

landscape.text1: Match Your Numbers to Lucky Numbers and win a prize. 0
landscape.text2: {img} Reveal a Star symbol to win a prize instantly. 0

portrait.text1: Match Your Numbers to Lucky Numbers and win a prize. 0
portrait.text2: Reveal a Star symbol to win a prize instantly. A 2x Star doubles the prize. 0
portrait.text3: Reveal a Wheel Bonus symbol to trigger the Wheel Bonus. 0
portrait.text4: Reveal the Prize Bonus symbol to trigger the Prize Bonus. 0

landscape.text1: {img} Reveal a Wheel Bonus symbol to trigger the Wheel Bonus. 0
landscape.text2:
WHEEL BONUS - Spin the wheel to begin the bonus game. The inner wheel reveals
your prize and the outer wheel reveals the prize multiplier. 0

portrait.text1:
WHEEL BONUS - Spin the wheel to begin the bonus game. The inner wheel reveals
your prize and the outer wheel reveals the prize multiplier. 0

landscape.text1: {img} Reveal a Prize Bonus symbol to trigger the Prize Bonus. 0
landscape.text2:
PRIZE BONUS - Press the Gold Bars to reveal prizes. Prizes accumulate in the Total Bonus Win meter.
Reveal Gold Coins to end the bonus and collect your prize! 0

portrait.text1:
PRIZE BONUS - Press the Gold Bars to reveal prizes. Prizes accumulate in the Total Bonus Win meter.
Reveal Gold Coins to end the bonus and collect your prize! 0
